title: Bech32 Wallet Address Prefix Converter
description: Convert between Cosmos(cosmos1), Ethereum(0x) with checksum and different cosmos or EVM based chain using bech32 address prefixes.

warning.title: Important Note about Cosmos (ATOM) vs EVM (ETH) Derivation Paths

text.derivation: Note that the {0} ({1}) of {2} is usually different from Ethereum/ETH (60)!
text.chains: Some EVM-compatible Cosmos-SDK based chains (e.g., {0}, Dymension) use 60 as the derivation path. Please be careful when you are converting prefixes based on these chains.
text.cosmostation: For an example list of derivation paths for different chains, please refer to {0}.
text.2: This means this tool CANNOT calculate conversion between Cosmos and EVM addresses from a SEED PHRASE (HD Wallet).
text.4: On the other hand, if a PRIVATE KEY is used instead, the converted address would be correct for all chains.

eip55.title: What is an EVM Checksum Address (EIP-55)?
eip55.text: A checksum address ({0}) is a system for Ethereum addresses that adds a mix of uppercase and lowercase letters to help catch typing mistakes. By using a special method to decide which letters should be capitalized, it makes errors more obvious and helps ensure transactions go to the correct address.
